LOD.summary: A news anchor, dressed in a suit and tie, stands in front of a cityscape backdrop, delivering a report on the flooding in Mogadishu, his voice serious as he details the damage and the efforts to clear the streets.

modalities.visual: A news anchor stands in front of a cityscape backdrop, delivering a report on the flooding in Mogadishu.
modalities.speech: Heavy flooding has hit Mombasa, caused by heavy rains and poor drainage, with houses submerged and families unable to leave their homes.

children.caption: Reporters from various locations around the world, including Kasese, Mogadishu, and Mukono, provide news updates on the severe flooding in their respective regions, highlighting the devastation and the efforts to clear the streets and provide aid to those affected.
children.summary: A news reporter, dressed in a white shirt and black tie, delivers a report on the flooding in various regions, including Kasese, Mogadishu, and Mukono, detailing the damage and efforts to clear the streets. The reports are delivered in a serious tone, reflecting the gravity of the situation, with the news anchor providing a comprehensive overview of the flooding situation.

children.caption: Severe flooding affects various regions around the world, including a reporter standing in a flooded street in a city, another reporter standing in front of a flooded building in Mombasa, and reporters from other locations providing updates on the devastation and efforts to clear the streets and provide aid to those affected.
children.summary: Heavy rainfall has caused widespread flooding in Mombasa, with debris and partially submerged cars visible on the streets, with reports from KTN News providing live updates on the situation. The flooding has affected various regions, including Kasese, Mogadishu, and Mukono, with damage and efforts to clear the streets detailed in serious reports.

children.caption: A severe rainstorm has caused widespread flooding in various cities around the world, with reporters providing updates on the situation and its impact. The flooding has caused roads to be closed and debris to be scattered on the ground, with some areas experiencing severe devastation. Reporters from different locations are standing in flooded streets and areas, describing the situation and the efforts to clear the streets and provide aid to those affected.
children.summary: Heavy rainfall has caused widespread flooding in several cities, including Mukono, Mombasa, Kasese, Mogadishu, and others, with streets submerged under water, debris scattered, and reports of destruction and damage. The flooding has affected major roads, including the Mbale-Kamuli road, and has been documented by reporters from various news outlets, including live updates from the floodwaters.

tree.caption: Severe flooding caused by heavy rainfall is affecting various cities around the world, including Keta in Ghana and Mogadishu in Somalia, causing devastation and disrupting the lives of residents. The flooding has resulted in closed roads, debris-filled streets, and severe devastation in some areas. Reporters are providing updates on the situation and the efforts to clear the streets and provide aid to those affected.
tree.summary: Heavy rainfall has caused widespread flooding in several cities, including Keta, Ghana, Mogadishu, Somalia, and others, with streets and buildings submerged in water, debris scattered, and reports of destruction and damage. The flooding has affected major roads and has been documented by reporters from various news outlets, with locals expressing somber reactions to the destruction.
